OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CARE TRUST - ADULT MENTAL HEALTH SERVICE NORTH SECTOR

Desc.entry: A joint initiative between Sheffield Health and Social Care Trust and Sheffield City Council's Neighbourhoods and Community Care Directorate to provide community mental health services (for people aged 16-65 years) including community psychiatric nurses, social workers, occupational therapists, psychologists and medical staff for the North East of Sheffield. GP referral preferred.
